import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BlogsService } from 'src/app/services/blogs.service'; import { Blog } from 'src/app/Blog'; @Component({ selector: 'app-blogs', templateUrl: './blogs.component.html', styleUrls: ['./blogs.component.css'] }) export class BlogsComponent { blogs: Blog[] = []; leftColumn: Blog[]; rightColumn: Blog[]; constructor(private blogService: BlogsService) { this.leftColumn = this.blogs.filter((_, index) => index % 2 === 0); this.rightColumn = this.blogs.filter((_, index) => index % 2 === 1); } ngOnInit(): void { this.blogService.getBlogs().subscribe((blogs) => { this.blogs = blogs console.log(blogs); }); } }
